title: Two-Way Table Distribution Calculator
description: Interactive calculator for computing marginal and conditional distributions from a two-way contingency table. Features editable cells, step-by-step formula display, and highlighted cells showing which values are used in each calculation.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Statistics
Categorical Data
Two-Way Tables
Marginal Distribution
Conditional Distribution
Contingency Tables

buttons.name: Marginal Row
buttons.description: Calculate marginal distribution of row variable

buttons.name: Marginal Col
buttons.description: Calculate marginal distribution of column variable

editableCells.description: Click on any data cell to edit its value (0-100)
